```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(medicaldata)
```

```{r}
covid_testing
```

```{r}
covid <- covid_testing %>% 
  filter(test_id == "covid") %>% 
  mutate(result = str_to_title(result))
covid
```


```{r}
covid_summary <- covid %>% 
  summarise(percent_positive = sum(result == "Positive")/length(result))
covid_summary
```
